member.name: T:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for DataTime class.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.IsWeekend(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Determine whether date is weekend.
member.returns: true if date is in weekend, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.IsLeapYear(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Determine whether year from date is leap.
member.returns: true if year is leap, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.IsLastDayOfMonth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Determine whether day from date is last day of the month.
member.returns: true if leap, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.IsInRange(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Determine whether date is in date range.
member.returns: true if value is in date range, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.Age(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get Age by birthDay date.
member.returns: Count of Age from birthDay to Today.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.IsToday(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Determine whether value date is today.
member.returns: true if value is Today, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.DateTimeExtensions.AreInTheSameWeek(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Determine whether firstDate and secondDate are in the same week.
member.returns: true if first and second date are from the same week, otherwise false.

member.name: T:MMLib.Extensions.ObjectExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for object.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.ObjectExtensions.SetPropertyValue(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified property.
member.param: A value which specifies the property's name.
An object which represents the new value
member.returns: true if target object has this property, otherwise false.
member.exception: Occured when newValue doesn't have same type as property.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.ObjectExtensions.GetPropertyValue``1(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified property.
member.typeparam: Type of return value, which expect.
member.param: A value which specifies the property's name.
member.returns: Value which represents the value of the specified property.
member.exception: This exception occured, when target object doesn't have specific propertyName.
This exception occured, when return type is not type of the TValue.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.ObjectExtensions.GetPropertyValue(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified property.
member.param: A value which specifies the property's name.
member.returns: Value which represents the value of the specified property.
member.exception: This exception occured, when target object doesn't have specific propertyName.
This exception occured, when return type is not type of the TValue.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.ObjectExtensions.ToXElement(System.Object)
member.summary: Serialize object value to XElement.
member.returns: XElement with serialize data from object.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.ObjectExtensions.FromXElement``1(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Deserialize object from XElement
member.returns: Deserialized value.

member.name: T:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for string

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.RemoveDiacritics(System.String)
member.summary: Remove diacritics from string. Origin value can be null and String.Empty.
member.returns: New string value without diacritics.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.Truncate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Truncate string to max lenght. Origin value can by null and String.Empty.
member.param: Max length of new string. Greater than zero.
member.returns: Truncated string.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.RemoveChars(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Remove unexpected chars from string.
member.param: Origin string value. Can by null and String.Empty.
String with unexpected chars. Can by null and String.Empty.
member.returns: New string without unexpected chars

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitBySeparator(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Split string by string separator.
member.returns: Splited by separator.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitBySeparator(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Split string by string separator.
member.param: True, if can remove empty lines. Else false.
member.returns: Splited by separator.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.SafeTrimStart(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all leading occurrences of a set of characters specified in an array from the current System.String object. If value is null then return null.
member.returns: The string that remains after all occurrences of characters in the trimChars parameter are removed from the start of the current string. If trimChars is null or an empty array, white-space characters are removed instead.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.SafeLength(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the number of characters in the current System.String object. If value is null then return 0.
member.returns: The number of characters in the current string.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.SafeSubstring(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a substring from this instance. The substring starts at a specified character position and has a specified length. If value is null or empty then return origin text.
member.param: The number of characters in the substring.
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to the substring of length length that begins at startIndex in this instance, or System.String.Empty if startIndex is equal to the length of this instance and length is zero.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Check, if string value is number.
member.returns: True: if string value is number, else False.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified string is null or an System.String.Emptystring.
member.returns: true if the value parameter is null or an empty string (""); otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether a specified string is null, empty, or consists only of white-space characters.
member.returns: true if the value parameter is null or System.String.Empty, or if value consists exclusively of white-space characters.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.FormatAsPattern(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Replaces one or more format items in a specified string with the string representation of a specified object.
member.returns: A copy of format in which any format items are replaced by the string representation of arg0.
member.exception: The format item in format is invalid.-or- The index of a format item is not zero.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.FormatAsPattern(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Replaces one or more format items in a specified string with the string representation of a corresponding object in a specified array.
member.param: An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.
member.returns: A copy of format in which any format items are replaced by the string representation of the corresponding objects in args.
member.exception: The format item in format is invalid.-or- The index of a format item is not zero.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.JoinToString(System.Object[],System.String)
member.summary: Join values to one string with separator.
member.returns: String, which contain joined values with separator.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.JoinToString(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Join values to one string with separator.
member.returns: String, which contain joined values with separator.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.DefaultIfNull(System.String)
member.summary: Check value is null and then return value or string.Empty.
member.returns: Value if value is not null, otherwise string.Empty.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.DefaultIfNull(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check value is null and then return value or defValue.
member.param: Default value if value is null.
member.returns: Value if value is not null, otherwise defValue.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsValidEmailAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Check if specific email address is valid.
member.returns: true - if address is valid, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsValidIPAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Check if specific IP address is valid.
member.returns: true - if address is valid, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsValidUrlAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Check if specific URL address is valid.
member.returns: true - if address is valid, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MMLib.Extensions.StringExtensions.HtmlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Decode html text to plain text. (Replace Html entities like copy; to Â©).
member.returns: Plain text.
